categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi

nodes.text: Canto Bight is the unabridged audio version of the canon novella collection of the same name, written by Saladin Ahmed, Rae Carson, Mira Grant, and John Jackson Miller. The audiobook was performed by Sean Kenin, Saskia Maarleveld, Marc Thompson, and Jonathan Davis, and was released by Random House Audio on December 5, 2017, as part of Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi.
